    • About Misty SOLDwisch


    Professional service with an emphasis on guidance, planning, and dedication to my clients’ needs are my top priority. My greatest strength as a realtor is my ability to think outside the box–whether it is developing a unique marketing strategy or highlighting the potential in a property with my decorating and staging skills. I am a proactive, hands-on agent that is willing to do what it takes to meet your real estate needs.

    In addition, offering a unique TEAM approach – where we have specialized roles in each step of the process —ensures an unparalleled expertise and customer service experience. We know that real estate transactions can be stressful and of great financial value to our clients—it is important to work with full time professionals with your best interest at heart!
